attributes.action: Give the vote on a 2nd EU referendum to 16 & 17 year olds.
attributes.additional_details: The majority of young people eligible to vote were in favour of staying in the EU. 75% of 18 - 25 year olds voted YES.
attributes.background: Our young people are the ones who will, in the long term, be most affected by the outcome.They deserve the right to help decide what their future will be.
